title: 致命报错，求大佬解决！
author: 孤
txt_content:
只要出现下方的报错，(生存\地皮)的世界没人，就会疯狂涨实体最高涨到21万实体，造成服务器非常卡一进实体多的世界会直接卡死主线程，求大佬解决。

版本1.7.10
端使用的是Uranium




QQ图片20190827235539.png (32.76 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-8-27 23:55 上传






报错内容 只有这些
[23:35:58] [Server thread/WARN]: EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: appeng.tile.misc.TileInscriber@38c1c0ac (appeng.tile.misc.TileInscriber@38c1c0ac) doesn't match the registered te appeng.tile.misc.TileInscriber@c6ea825, skipping


[23:35:58] [Server thread/WARN]: EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: appeng.tile.misc.TileCharger@55902572 (appeng.tile.misc.TileCharger@55902572) doesn't match the registered te appeng.tile.misc.TileCharger@483e880e, skipping


[23:35:58 WARN]: EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityCentrifuge@6b6dcc72 (ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityCentrifuge@6b6dcc72) doesn't match the registered te ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityCentrifuge@340d8678, skipping


[23:35:58 WARN]: EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityBlockCutter@1e9d25ca (ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityBlockCutter@1e9d25ca) doesn't match the registered te ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityBlockCutter@5184de08, skipping


[23:35:58 WARN]: EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: ic2.core.block.reactor.tileentity.TileEntityNuclearReactorElectric@3a81433e (ic2.core.block.reactor.tileentity.TileEntityNuclearReactorElectric@3a81433e) doesn't match the registered te ic2.core.block.reactor.tileentity.TileEntityNuclearReactorElectric@2dfbfdc6, skipping


[23:35:58 WARN]: EnergyNet.removeTileEntity: ic2.core.block.reactor.tileentity.TileEntityReactorChamberElectric@352543d4 (ic2.core.block.reactor.tileentity.TileEntityNuclearReactorElectric@3a81433e) doesn't match the registered te ic2.core.block.reactor.tileentity.TileEntityNuclearReactorElectric@2dfbfdc6, skipping

replies.author: 莫千流
replies.txt_content: 工业2的物品上面报错而已

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
加一个laggremove插件试试，可以限制区块实体数量
（楼主你服务器5w实体TPS还是19，服务器多少钱啊）（逃
